item.title: CVE-2022-21788|2024-08-03T02:53:36.268Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983
item.description: In scp, there is a possible undefined behavior due to incorrect error handling. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06988728; Issue ID: ALPS06988728.
